page.title: 06A Typical Primary Week.
page.content: Outlined below is a typical week in the life of a 10-11 year old child attending Bryn Deri Primary School. Monday-Creative Writing,Mental Arithmetic,Environmental Studies,P.E. Tuesday-Computer Studies,Art/Craft, Reading Laboratory,Mathematics. Wednesday-English Grammar,Mathematics, Religious Knowledge,Welsh,Music. Thursday-Science,Games,Reading Laboratory,Mathematics. Friday-Spelling,Handwriting,Environmen tal Studies Television Programme, Welsh. Assemblies each morning 9-00-9-30. School opens 8-55 closes 3-30. Lunch 12-00-1-00 Junior children. 12-00-1-25 Infant children.
